channel.title: Java on Dong - A place to track my time log
channel.description: Recent content in Java on Dong - A place to track my time log

item.title: 21. Microservices
item.description: Microservice is a combination of multiple independent applications.

item.title: 19. Publish to the Production Server
item.description: Publish SpringBoot applications to a production environment server in the form of jar packages.

item.title: 17. Wish List
item.description: We can add our favorite products into wish list.

item.title: 15. New Arrivals - When and Choose in MyBatis
item.description: We can show our newly arrived products on the home page.

item.title: 14. Top Products - Connect to Redis with Jedis
item.description: Redis can be used to cache data that needs to be accessed frequently, data will be cached in memory, and we can manipulate Redis through Jedis.

item.title: 13. Merchant List and Detail
item.description: Merchants can sell their own products on the platform for consumers to buy.

item.title: 12. Product Detail - Product and Merchant Info
item.description: Customers can learn about the product information that a merchant has sold through the product details page.

item.title: 11. Product List - Pagination
item.description: Through paging techniques, we can only show some of the products.

item.title: 10. Static Resources - Nginx Configuration
item.description: With the Nginx server, we can increase the speed of loading static resources.

item.title: 9. User Authentication - Spring Interceptor
item.description: We can use Spring Interceptor feature to authenticate user more efficiently.

item.title: 8. User Login - Spring Security
item.description: Registered users can log into the system through a login interface.

item.title: 7. User Registration - Spring Security
item.description: The user can register an account to carry on the goods purchase operation.

item.title: 6. Modularization and Decoupling - Maven
item.description: Through the maven modularization mechanism, we can separate different types of functions and store them in different modules.

item.title: 5. Template Engine - Apache FreeMarker Macro
item.description: Through the macro features provided by FreeMarker, we can easily manage some of the commonly used template code.

item.title: 4. Template Engine - Apache FreeMarker
item.description: FreeMarker is a java-based template engine, commonly used to generate dynamic mvc architecture web pages.

item.title: 3. Connection Pool - Alibaba Druid and Google Guava
item.description: Druid is a database connection pool component developed by Alibaba middleware team. It includes powerful connection pool monitoring features.

item.title: 2. Database Access - MyBatis and MariaDB 10.x
item.description: We first need to install a MariaDB 10.x database locally, and then access the database through MyBatis configuration.

item.title: 1. HelloWorld Demo - Hello Spring Stack
item.description: Let’s use the spring initializer web features provided by the spring website to generate a super-simple hello world project.
